message: Hi Bob, I have a product that I think would be of great value to you. It's worth at least $10,000 to me, but I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,500. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I am willing to pay $10,000 for it.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to let go of the product for that price.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $10,500 is the lowest I can go.  Let me know if you're interested in moving forward at that price.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I am still very interested in purchasing the product. I am willing to pay $10,200 for it.
